snippet: The Beach Boys will perform at the Grammy Awards on Sunday, marking the first time the founding members of that band have played together in public in two decades, the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences announced.
abstract: The Beach Boys will perform at the Grammy Awards on Sunday, marking the first time the founding members of that band have played together in public in two decades, the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences announced.
lead_paragraph: The Beach Boys will perform at the Grammy Awards on Sunday, marking the first time the founding members of that band have played together in public in two decades, the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences announced. The seminal pop group will perform with Maroon 5 and Foster the People, both of which are nominated for awards this year.

headline.main: Beach Boys to Join Maroon 5 and Foster the People on Grammys Stage

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences
